disease: Malignant neoplasm of ampulla of Vater

symptoms.name: Jaundice
symptoms.pattern: Usually the first sign, yellowing of the eyes and skin due to bile duct blockage

imaging_findings.CT-A/P/C: Ampullary mass may not be well visualized; no significant biliary ductal dilation or pancreatic duct abnormalities identified in some cases.

required: Biopsy showing high-grade dysplasia or carcinoma
supportive: Imaging findings suggestive of ampullary mass
